pullrequest.title: Stop the cordless drill from dancing around

content.raw:
What drill are you using? I don't see any shaking: http://youtu.be/CzJaoIQqAWQ

edit: hmmm, it does bounce in the qual2 world though ... actually there's a lot of weird stuff happening like the drill jumping and rotating by almost 90deg while "standing" on the ground.
content.html:
